articles.description: Industry body IATA says it sees its pass as essential for reopening quarantine-free travel.
articles.content:
image captionThe pass is seen by the sector as essential for reopening air travel
The International Air Transport Association (IATA) says it expects its digital Covid Travel Pass will be ready "with… [+3584 chars]
